Class DynamicObjectGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • DynamicObjectGenerator

  • public class DynamicObjectGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generates the Dynamic Object that is then used to visually represent the object in the game.
    Version:
    May 21, 2016
    Author:
    Vaishnav Balaji, Period: 5, Assignment: Frogger Final Project, Sources: None

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CAR
      The index at which the car is stored
      static int LPAD
      The index at which the pad is stored
      jig.engine.util.Vector2D position
      The vector representation of the position of the moving object
      java.util.Random r
      Random number generator
      static int SPAD
      The index at which the secondary pad is stored
      static int TRUCK
      The index at which the truck is stored
      jig.engine.util.Vector2D velocity
      The vector representation of the velocity of the moving object

      DynamicObjectGenerator(jig.engine.util.Vector2D pos, jig.engine.util.Vector2D v)
      Constructor that instantiates the various Dynamic Objects in the array

      • DynamicObjectGenerator

        public DynamicObjectGenerator(jig.engine.util.Vector2D pos,
                              jig.engine.util.Vector2D v)
        Constructor that instantiates the various Dynamic Objects in the array
        Parameters:
        pos - vector at which the object is to be generated
        v - vector of the velocity at which the object is moving

    • Method Detail

      • getDynamicObjectArr

        public int[] getDynamicObjectArr()

      • buildBasicObject

        public DynamicObject buildBasicObject(int type,
                                      int chance)
        Builds basic moving object depending on the condition of the user in the game
        Parameters:
        type - CAR, TRUCK, SPAD, LPAD
        chance - probability of the object appearing
        Returns:
        DynamicObject on the environment and position that the user is currently in during the game/level. Varies with different situations

      • buildSecondaryPadWithAnimal

        public DynamicObject buildSecondaryPadWithAnimal(int chance)
        This builds the secondary pad at the same time a crocodile or turtle is made
        Parameters:
        chance - probability of the creation occurring
        Returns:
        the obstacle that is to be created

      • buildPadWithAnimal

        public DynamicObject buildPadWithAnimal(int chance)
        This builds the pad at the same time a crocodile is made
        Parameters:
        chance - probability of the creation occurring
        Returns:
        the obstacle that is to be created

      • buildObstacle

        public DynamicObject buildObstacle()
        Builds the obstacles. Cars are more common than trucks. If there are no other vehicles in a given line, a cop car appears
        Returns:
        the moving object that is chosen

      • update

        public void update(long time)
        Updates the GUI to keep the game moving
        Parameters:
        time - the time tracker in the system
